profile.label: Profile
profile.text:
As a passionate full-stack web developer, I specialize in creating portals and modules using PHP, Python and JavaScript frameworks, as well as HTML5 and CSS. My experience includes creating new websites and portals, developing modules, parsing HTML pages, creating and improving WordPress themes.

A continuous learner, I actively explore emerging technologies during my work. I aim to make websites that look great and work smoothly by considering all aspects together.

In addition, I am proficient in regular expressions for efficient data manipulation and have good skills in interacting with SQL, both directly and through ORM models, to ensure robust database functionality. Passionate about customer satisfaction, I collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver successful projects.

employment_arr.title: Middle PHP-, JavaScript Programmer
employment_arr.text:
My tasks:

  • Web Application Development with Laravel, Symfony, Vue.js, jQuery, Angular, Bootstrap, Tailwind etc.
  • Development and modification of modules for Magento2, Dolibarr, Wordpress for customization and enhance the platform's functionality.

Gained skilles:

  • Improved independent work and organizing my personal time to complete tasks most efficiently.
  • Improved ability to find the best solution to achieve set goals.
  • Improved ability to completing assigned tasks on time.
  • Working in a team with regular exchange of information for optimal distribution of tasks across the team.
  • Building the structure and functionality of the application based on the client's wishes.
  • Independent testing of completed tasks.
  • Providing feedback and testing the code developed by team members.

employment_arr.title: Operations Manager and ERP Integrator
employment_arr.text:
My tasks:

  • Processing customer orders and maintaining primary accounting.
  • Setting up automation for order processing.
  • Warehouse accounting.
  • Setting up the client portal.
  • Setting up automation for adding new products to the accounting system, utilizing built-in functions of the accounting system and developing additional Python scripts.

Gained skilles:

  • Working with CRM and ERP systems. Setting them up and automating processes.
  • Primary accounting procedures.
  • Improved independent work and organizing personal time to complete tasks most efficiently.
  • Improved skills of HTML, CSS and JavaScript during client portal setup.
  • Studied the Python programming language to write scripts that enhance process automation capabilities.
  • Developed the skill of interacting with REST APIs while writing Python scripts to add products to the accounting system and synchronize product availability with suppliers.

employment_arr.title: Junior SEO-webtools Developer
employment_arr.text:
My tasks:

  • Content SEO optimization.
  • Development and customization of WordPress themes.
  • Data analysis.

Gained skilles:

  • Improved organizing my personal time to complete tasks most efficiently.
  • Improved ability to find the best solution to achieve set goals.
  • Mastering the use of regular expressions to effectively automate data analysis.
  • Applying knowledge of HTML and CSS when developing themes for WordPress.
  • Learned PHP programming language to independently develop and customize WordPress themes.
  • Working with SQL databases to migrate websites to WordPress from other content management systems.
  • Adapting texts written by copywriters for SEO promotion purposes.

employment_arr.title: Salesperson
employment_arr.text:
My tasks:

  • Adding new products to the store website and writing a unique and comprehensive description for them.
  • Writing short articles about employees' sports and outdoor life for the store's blog to promote the shop online.
  • Participation in designing and improving the store website.
  • Consultation for buyers of Outdoor equipment and clothing.
  • Processing online orders.
  • Placing orders with suppliers.
  • Accounting reconciliation with suppliers.

Gained skilles:

  • Skill in communicating with customers both in person and via telephone or email.
  • Selection of equipment tailored to customer needs from available assortment.
  • Finding the optimal solution to a problem in a high-pressure situation.
  • Improved independent work and organizing my personal time to complete tasks most efficiently.
  • Working with accounting and inventory management systems.
  • Working with content management systems.
  • Writing short and comprehensive texts and articles for product or store promotion.

employment_arr.title: Online Shop Manager
employment_arr.text:
My tasks:

  • Processing customer orders.
  • Participation in the production process of school teaching materials.
  • Placing orders with suppliers.
  • Accounting reconciliation with suppliers.

Gained skilles:

  • Ability to adapt and work with a variety of accounting and content management systems.
  • Work with other departments to effectively accomplish assigned tasks.
  • Skill in communicating with customers via telephone or email.
  • Developed skills in supplier interaction through order placement and accounting reconciliation processes.

employment_arr.title: Call Center Operator
employment_arr.text:
My tasks:

  • Technical support for cable television and cable Internet users.
  • Selling company services to new and existing clients.

Gained skilles:

  • Communicating with clients by telephone.
  • Stress resistance.
  • Finding the solution to a problem in a high-pressure situation, often with limited information.
  • Ability to collaborate with other technical departments to resolve client inquiries and issues.
  • Ability to block out external distractions and concentrate on work in noisy environments.

employment_arr.title: Laboratory Assistant
employment_arr.firm: National Technical University of Ukraine 'Kyiv Polytechnic Institute
employment_arr.text:
My tasks:

  • Typing handwritten text on a computer to create university teaching materials.

Gained skilles:

  • Creating layouts for educational technical materials for printing.
  • Redrawing technical images from hand-drawn sketches in MS Word to ensure quality when printed at different scales.
  • Effectively managing time to efficiently complete tasks while also dedicating time to learning.
  • Responsibly completing assigned tasks on time.

arr.title: Bachelor in Electronic Equipment
arr.place: Educational and Research Institute of Telecommunication Systems in National Technical University of Ukraine “Igor Sikorsky Kyiv Polytechnic Institute”
